actions.recommendation: Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep ,try manage stress. Discussed raised BP, follow up with GP.

Getting to the route of chronic fatigue: Eat a whole food, anti-inflammatory diet, Check for hidden infections and allergies, address and discuss any gut issues, exercise regularly, practice deep relaxation and sleep for 8 hours every night.
Visit a Radiologist for a mammogram
